description:
It features a tiny baby Corbyn being cradled by Karl Marx.
Taiwanese animation company TomoNews has become known for its incredibly weird interpretations of current affairs, and its video on Jeremy Corbyn's Labour leadership bid doesn't disappoint.
youtube.com
It begins with a top-hatted David Cameron kicking a crying Ed Miliband who has a bacon sandwich attached to his mouth, obviously.
vine.co
Then Corbyn knocks over the cardboard cutouts of his leadership rivals on his bike and soaks up the adulation of the crowd.
vine.co
But the climax of the piece is probably this moment, when Donald Trump and Jeremy Corbyn have a fight, which Vladimir Putin is enjoying on TV while sitting next to an enormous communist panda.
vine.co
View Entire List ›
title: Taiwanese Animators Have Made An Absolutely Bizarre Video About Jeremy Corbyn
